turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about The Last: Naruto the Movie.
turn.1: What was something interesting about the review of The Last: Naruto the Movie?
turn.2: Besides criticising the film's overarching plot and nondescript score, Amy McNulty described Toneri as an unengaging antagonist.
turn.4: A "Toon Zone" reviewer wrote that the villain was overshadowed by the relationship between Naruto and Hinata, which made the film more appealing. "The Last" was first announced at Jump Festa 2012.
turn.6: The film's first trailer premiered on 31 July 2014.
turn.7: Anything else interesting about the review?
turn.8: It was promoted in the lead-up to the "Naruto" manga finale in "Weekly Shōnen Jump", with information announced weekly.
turn.9: When did the movie come out?
turn.10: The film premiere took place on 6 December 2014.
turn.12: A limited-edition data book with Kishimoto's one-shot tie-in chapter was distributed with the film.
